extension.name: PLG_RS_PAYMENT_GIROPAY
extension.author: redCOMPONENT.com
extension.description: This plugin enables standard GiroPay payments

field.name: merchant_id
field.label: Giropay Merchant ID
field.description: The Merchant ID you have received from Giropay.

field.name: project_id
field.label: Giropay Project ID
field.description: The ID of the project by the dealer. This will possibly at several shops provided.

field.name: source_id
field.label: Giropay Source ID
field.description: The Source ID you have received from Giropay.Identification of the shop system

field.name: secret_password
field.label: Giropay secret password
field.description: The Password you have created when create Project in GiroPay

field.name: verify_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for successful transactions
field.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

field.name: invalid_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for failed transactions
field.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

field.name: capture_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Capture Payment Status
field.description: Select an capture status for capturing payment.

field.name: economic_design_layout
field.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
